titleStmt.title: SII 13.218: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 218. (A.R. No. 16 of 1931.) ON THE SAME WALL.

summary.p: This, like No. 217 above, is also stated to be a copy of an old record on a loose stone for which consequently there was no use. It records an agreement given by the sabhā of Tirukkōḍikkā alias Kaṇṇamaṅgalam for the lump amount (iṟaiyili-mudal) received by them, to pay all the taxes on 3(1/2) mā of land endowed to the temple by a certain Aruḷākki Śēndaṉ of Ārūr in Nallāṟṟūr-nāḍu for feeding women and men pilgrims in the temple.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . Ituvumoru paḻaṅkalpaṭi . kovirājakesaripanmarkku yāṇṭu 10 1Āvatu vaṭa karai nallāṟṟūrnāṭṭu Ā
rūr Uṭaiyāṉ Aruḷākki centaṉeṉ Innāṭṭu kaṇṇamaṅkalattu putuvāykkāliṉ vaṭakarai muṉṟumāvum vaṭakarai
Araimāvum Immummāvaraic ceyyum miraṇṭu kūṟu peṇṇaṭiyārkaḷmā ruṇpatāka Orukūṟu Āṇṭiyā ruṇpatāka
ccantrātittaval Eppeṟpaṭṭa Iṟaiyu miṟuttuk kuṭuppomāy Iṟaiyilimutal koṇṭom kaṇṇamaṅkala
ttu sabhaiyom Itaṟṟiṟampil nālekāl mutalāka Iyaṟṟaṇṭamiṭa Oṭṭinom sabhaiyo
m tirukkoṭikaāvāna kaṇṇamaṅkalattu sabhaiyom Itu paḻayakalpaṭi In=ta śrī vimānattille Eṟa ve
ṭṭinamaiyil muṉṉivājagam veṭṭikkiṭa(ṭa)nta taṉikallāl Ubhaiyokam Illāmaiyil Atu tavirn=tatu Itu
muṭṭil paṉmāyeśvarar kaṭaikūṭṭa peṟṟār .
Digital edition of SII 13.218 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
